properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , CATEGORY_NO , POINT , MEM_STATUS , ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_BIRTH = ? , PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , ADDRESS = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , CATEGORY_NO , POINT , MEM_STATUS , ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MEM_ID = ?
